summary.p: This Bengali-script edition of the Śabdakalpadruma lexicon seems to be the first edition. This sixth volume is dated to the Śaka year 1770, corresponding to 1848/49 CE.

acquisition.p: The Bibliotheca Regia Monacensis stamp dates its acquisition to before 1919.

encodingDesc.p: IAST transliteration. An underscore represents an explicit virāma. Two underscores represent a khaṇḍa ta.
